alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central La Plata County through 545 PM MDT... At 513 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms 8 miles north of Bayfield, or 15 miles east of Durango, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, moderate to heavy rain, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central La Plata County, including the following locations... Vallecito. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
